I need to do a regular expression search and replace on all uris that the c=
rawler finds, before 
they are processed.  I am having trouble deciding whe=
re the best place to do this is.  Also, is 
it possible to modify the uri o=
nce it has been created?  

The other question I have is if the bdbfrontier=
 keeps a record of all crawluris that could be 
used after the crawl has be=
en completed.  I would like to generate a final report after the 
crawl has=
 finished and I wanted to avoid having to read back in the logs I already g=
enerated.

Thanks for the help.

-Sam
